thread.title: Jose Mourinho wants ‘two or three’ stars in summer spending spree to help Manchester United take ‘next step’
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho wants ‘two or three’ stars in summer spending spree to help Manchester United take ‘next step’

author: leeastley
title: Jose Mourinho wants ‘two or three’ stars in summer spending spree to help Manchester United take ‘next step’
text:
EFL Jose wants Mour Jose Mourinho wants ‘two or three’ stars in summer spending spree to help Manchester United take ‘next step’ 
The Special One guided Manchester United to their first trophy of the season but is already thinking about making additions By LEE ASTLEY Comments JOSE MOURINHO revealed he wants to bring in “two or three” more players in the summer. Jose Mourinho lifts the EFL Cup after Manchester United’s thrilling 3-2 win over Southampton Manchester United fans celebrate EFL Cup win against Southampton 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Mourinho told SkySports : "I think with this group of players, the squad we have and the difficulties we are having during the season, I think we are more than fine. 
"I think we will be ready in July to open the door for two or three good players to help us to improve our level. PA:Press Association Jose Mourinho wants to bring in more reinforcements in the summer to join Paul Pogba Martial and Lingard post videos of Manchester United players celebrating EFL Cup win 
"You reach a certain level of stability, you find your way to play, your philosophy and this is very important. 
"We are stable in the way the team plays and we need one more push. 
"The next push is the next transfer window. EPA Wayne Rooney could be offloaded at the end of the season to fund new arrivals related stories Ibrahomeovic Jose Mourinho says Manchester United fans should camp outside Zlatan Ibrahimovic's house until he signs new deal to stay next season at a boy Manchester United scouts watch Franck Kessie and Elseid Hysaj during Serie A clash between Napoli and Atalanta Swede 'n sour 'I've won what they've won in ten years', Did Zlatan Ibrahimovic troll Arsenal after EFL Cup win? Dave Kidd Wayne Rooney was denied a fairytale ending in what could be his last Wembley game for Manchester United Danny Higginbotham Zlatan Ibrahimovic was 'Cantona-esque', Manolo Gabbiadini deserved cup and Everton's entertaining midfield has them flying KING OF WEMBLEY Jesse Lingard scores AGAIN at Wembley in EFL Cup final against Southampton - then shares 'throne' photo The special glum 'We should be in extra time', Jose Mourinho hails valiant Southampton for EFL Cup final display Getty Images Zlatan Ibrahimovic netted twice as Manchester United won the EFL Cup Zlatan Ibrahimovic on Manchester United beating Southampton at Wembley 
"We didn't use it in the winter and we are obviously going to use it in the summer and trust the players we have. 
"Like Mr Woodward was saying, we will keep a huge percentage of the players we have at this moment in the squad. 
"We need the next push."
